description: Yurin Luciel is a resident of the Nora space colony. She is rescued by Flit during the UE attack on the colony. She seems to possess mysterious psychic abilities (precognition) that helped Flit with his fight during the UE`s attack on Nora. This is because she is an "X-Rounder", just like like Flit. Later seen to be allied with the UE but only seen in combat under duress. After developing a strong attraction to Flit she is forced into a mobile suit by Decil to act as a relay allowing him to control it remotely. After Flit`s battle with Decil leaves him defeated she manages to gain control of her suit and intercept the fatal blow. Unfortunately this leads to her brutal penetration by Decil, before perishing in the subsequent explosion.
name: Yurin Luciel
